description:
exp/template/html: recognize whitespace at start of URLs.

HTML5 uses "Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces" for
attrs: http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/index.html#attributes-1

    <a href=" {{.}}">

should be escaped to filter out "javascript:..." as data.

messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e08b731448e0 ***

exp/template/html: recognize whitespace at start of URLs.

HTML5 uses "Valid URL potentially surrounded by spaces" for
attrs: http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/index.html#attributes-1

    <a href=" {{.}}">

should be escaped to filter out "javascript:..." as data.

R=nigeltao
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5027045

subject: code review 5027045: exp/template/html: recognize whitespace at start of URLs.
